'''''"Balachko"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Fatui Pyro Agent|text="Balachko" — Shadows Like Blades Deepening}} while completing challenge conditions.
